response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product to you, which I believe would significantly enhance your operations and bring substantial value to your business. Given its exceptional quality and capabilities, it's worth noting that this product has an intrinsic value of $15,000 to you. Considering this, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire it at a special introductory price of $14,000. This represents a significant saving of $1,000 compared to its market value, making it an attractive proposition for you. I look forward to your consideration and hope we can collaborate soon. Should you have any questions or need further details about the product, please don't hesitate to reach out.", "product_price": 14000}
